title: How to Make Pickled Walnuts

steps.headline: Gather the nuts before their shells form.
steps.description: It is important to test for the formation of a shell by pricking each walnut with a needle. Discard any walnuts on which the needle detects shell formation. It is useful to know that the shell always forms at the end that is opposite to the stalk.

steps.headline: Prick the nuts that are free of shell.
steps.description: Place these in brine for 3 days.

steps.headline: Drain the nuts.
steps.description: Place in fresh brine and leave for 7 days.

steps.headline: Drain after the week has passed.
steps.description: Place the nuts on fruit drying racks or cake cooling racks. Leave for 24 hours to dry and blacken.

steps.headline: Clean and sterilise storage jar(s).
steps.description: Fill the jar(s) with walnuts. Pour in spiced vinegar over the walnuts (see recipe next).

steps.headline: Seal the jar(s).
steps.description: Allow the walnuts to marinate for at least one month.

steps.headline: Place the peppercorns, ginger-root, and allspice into the vinegar.
steps.description: Seal and leave to marinate at the same time as the walnuts soak in the brine.

text: Steps Gather the nuts before their shells form. It is important to test for the formation of a shell by pricking each walnut with a needle. Discard any walnuts on which the needle detects shell formation. It is useful to know that the shell always forms at the end that is opposite to the stalk. Prick the nuts that are free of shell. Place these in brine for 3 days. Drain the nuts. Place in fresh brine and leave for 7 days. Drain after the week has passed. Place the nuts on fruit drying racks or cake cooling racks. Leave for 24 hours to dry and blacken. Clean and sterilise storage jar(s). Fill the jar(s) with walnuts. Pour in spiced vinegar over the walnuts (see recipe next). Seal the jar(s). Allow the walnuts to marinate for at least one month. Recipe for Spiced Vinegar Place the peppercorns, ginger-root, and allspice into the vinegar. Seal and leave to marinate at the same time as the walnuts soak in the brine. Use as directed above.
